name: Virus Simulator
description:
Watch a virus spread among people and see how it is affected by different parameters.

Inspired by an article in The Washington Post: Why outbreaks like coronavirus spread exponentially, and how to “flatten the curve”

Parameters

* Number of people
* Movement speed
* Incubation time -- time between becoming infected and becoming sick
* Illness time -- how long a person is sick
* Mortality rate -- percentage of sick people that die
* "Social distancing" -- percentage of people that minimize their movement to avoid spreading the infection
